New year's upon us and it is time to celebrate with the friends.
- Check out our new collection of skins in the Weapons Store and Car Dealer
- Now there are races distributed across the vast city
- New police cars and system
- New supermarket added to the game
- Discounts and offers on majority of game items.
- the game has experienced many enhancements and optimization

In this update, voice chat has been added to speak with friends and can be activated from Voice Cards as well.
This update contains many bug fixes and modifications within the game.
